Name: Process - Wait for or Force close
Description: Waits a set amount of time for a process to close and optionally force closes the process after the timeout expires.
Author: svenkle

Parameters.Name: Seconds
Parameters.Label: Seconds
Parameters.HelpText: The number of seconds to wait before forcefully killing the application

Parameters.Name: Force
Parameters.Label: Force Kill
Parameters.HelpText: Whether or not the application should be forcefully killed after the timeout has expired.

Parameters.Name: ProcessName
Parameters.Label: Process Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the process to wait for
